context_bundle.summary: WoW addon publishing workflow - packaging, CurseForge, Wago.io, thumbnail requirements, TOC format, approval process.

onboarding.quick_start:
1. Package: Compress-Archive -Path AddonFolder -DestinationPath Addon-Version.zip
2. Wago.io: https://addons.wago.io - upload zip, 512x320 thumbnail
3. CurseForge: https://authors.curseforge.com - upload zip, 400x400 thumbnail
4. Categories: Interface Enhancements, Development Tools
5. Game Version: 11.0.2 (The War Within)
common_patterns:
# TOC required fields:
## Interface: 110002
## Title: AddonName
## Version: 1.0.0
## Author: YourName
# Zip structure: AddonName.zip containing AddonName/ folder
known_errors: Thumbnail must be exact dimensions or upload fails
TOC Interface number must match game version
Zip must contain folder matching addon name exactly
